qas.question: What year did the Korean War start?
Who walked out of the U.N. security meeting?
In what two countries did the American troops fight Communist forces?
In what year did the Korean war end?
What year did the Vietnam War begin?
Who entered the U.N. security meeting?
In what two countries did the American troops fight for Communist forces?
In what year did the Vietnam War end?

context: During the Cold War, American troops and their allies fought Communist forces in <a2_0><b6_0>Korea and Vietnam<b6_0/><a2_0/>. The Korean War began in <a0_0><b4_0>1950<b4_0/><a0_0/>, when <a1_0><b5_0>the Soviets<b5_0/><a1_0/> walked out of a U.N. Security meeting, removing their possible veto. Under a United Nations umbrella, hundreds of thousands of U.S. troops fought to prevent the takeover of South Korea by North Korea, and later, to invade the northern nation. After repeated advances and retreats by both sides, and the PRC People's Volunteer Army's entry into the war, the Korean Armistice Agreement returned the peninsula to the status quo in <a3_0><b7_0>1953<b7_0/><a3_0/>.
